item.title: How to NOT Clean Your Leather Shoes
item.description: Let’s face it, nowadays we google things on all tasks including how to clean your shoes. However, not all of the advices online are correct and some are even in the realm of madness. I list some of the ideas that sounds plausible, but in fact, should be avoided when you want to clean your leather shoes. DONT use alcohol to clean leather Alcohol will dries your leather. It might also leave its own stain, and in the worst case scenario it can strip the original dye out of the leather causing permanent discoloration.

item.title: How to Polish Shoes
item.description: A pair of shiny shoes will greatly enhance your dapper looks. Fortunately, it’s not hard to polish your shoes. You just need the right equipments. Depending on your preference (if you like those mirror finish a.k.a spit shine), you may also need to invest a bit of time in polishing your shoes. Without further ado, let’s begin! Equipment Shoe Polish Supplies Shoe polish Horsehair brush Applicator brush Shoe tree / paper Polishing cloth (optional) Water (optional) Shoe Polish There are two types of polish, cream or wax based.
